_header: My best beloved lady and mistress
Subjects: love letters; lovers, absence/separation of; lovers, addresses to beloved; lover’s plea

BodFair16.First Lines:
My best bylouyd lady and maistresseTo whom I must of verey ryght
                    obey…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…Wrytyn in hast of verrey trouth to sayAt [blank space left]
                    vpon our lady day

         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
